rukus.text: Samudo (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita
Kare-ra no doho sarifu ga, kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka
Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu
Dakara arra o osore watashi ni shitagai nasai
Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hoshu o motomenai. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu
Anata gata wa koko de, itsu made mo antaide i raremashou ka
kokumotsu hata ya, migotona waka mi o tsukeru natsumeyashi no en
mata (iwa) yama ni, anata gataga takumi ni ie o kiri ugatte mo (antaideari eyou ka)
Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai
Anata gata wa, muhona jokiwoisshita-sha no meirei ni, shitagatte wa narimasen
Kare-ra wa chijo ni kigai o hikiokosu mono de,(akuhei o) kyosei suru monode wa arimasen
Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa tsuka reta mono ni sugimasen
Anata wa, watashi-tachi to onaji hitori no ningen ni sugimasen. Anata no iu no ga hontonara, watashi-tachi ni shirushi o motarashi nasai
Kare (sarifu) wa itta. `Koko ni itto no mesu rakuda ga imasu. Soreni mo mizunomi-bi ga ari, mata anata gata ni mo,(sorezore) kimerareta mizunomi-bi ga arimasu
Idaina-bi no chobatsu ga anata gata o osowanai yo, soreni gai o kuwaete wa narimasen
Daga kare-ra wa, sono ken o kitte fugu ni shi, tachimachi kokai suru koto ni natta
Sore wa chobatsu ga kare-ra o osottakaradearu. Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru
